ygData.subject: Re: Sense Magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there any possible value to the sense magic spell we get at level 9 aside from a cheap way to raise my divinate spell ability? At this point that means that
ygData.messageBody:
Is there any possible value to the sense magic spell we get at level 9 aside
from a cheap way to raise my divinate spell ability?
At this point that means that my "flash of light" spell works more reliably, but
now that divinate is topped out, what purpose does sense magic serve? To tell me
that an item is magical or not? I can tell that with a simple right-click on the
item in my inventory, so no mystery there...

Kaladin, the flashing Paladin
